de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control

Class CommandConnection.CommandListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.control.CommandConnection.CommandListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    CommandConnection

    private class CommandConnection.CommandListener
extends java.lang.Thread
    The CommandConnection.CommandListener class is used to listen to incoming commands.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.lang.Thread

        java.lang.Thread.State, java.lang.Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

      private boolean mIsRunning
      true while the server has not reached end of thread execution
      private boolean mKeepRunning

      (package private) CommandConnection mListener
      This listener is called whenever a new command object is received.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CommandListener(CommandConnection listener)
      A new CommandListener instance created will open a socket on a random free port to grant listening for commands.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandListener

        CommandListener(CommandConnection listener)
         throws java.io.IOException
        A new CommandListener instance created will open a socket on a random free port to grant listening for commands.
        Parameters:
        listener - this class will be called when a new command object is received
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when an error occurs during binding of the socket
